Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, rough becoming very rough. in northeast, slight or moderate becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, wintry showers. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor in southwest.
